lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have the money and i'm aware of just how easy life is in this country compared to the way people live in poorer countries. It's nice to be able to help people out, even if their complete strangers.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people when they're unhappy with the treatment they've recieved from the company i work for. Sometimes all they want is an apology, or an explanation, other times further action or a monetary gesture is required.

lender.name: chiahui
lender.loan_because: I would like to give them opportunities to become economically independent

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: People are exceptional if given the correct tools to do what they need to do.

lender.name: Arafa
lender.loan_because: I need to increase my capital for retail shop trade .
lender.occupational_info: I am 35 years old ,Ihve 2 child one stady std 6 and other form 2 thus through my business anable me to be depandant for school fees and basic need.

lender.name: Jaron
lender.loan_because: I like helping people and the good feeling it gives me.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: My students want to give opoortunities to those without them.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 150 students a day and I teach them government.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I work throughout the world and am blessed by the good things life has bestowed upon me. I'm a low key kind of person and want to help others in my own way.

lender.name: mandy
lender.loan_because: Its good to share your good fortune

lender.name: Sanchin
lender.loan_because: May be I can do something little to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am teaching at universities as a part-time lecturer on media study, and other social sciences fields.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of Microfinance! I get great satisfaction out of helping others who are working hard to better themselves. "And if you spend yourselves in behalf of the hungry and satisfy the needs of the oppressed, then your light will rise in the darkness, and your night will become like the noonday." - Isaiah 58:10

lender.name: Campus Echo/NCCU
lender.occupation: Student Journalists with the NCCU Campus Echo
lender.loan_because: We first joined Kiva in 2007 while writing a news story about micro lending to inform NCCU's students about it. We incorporated our experience with making this loan into the news story. Now each year at our annual picnic we pass the hat and add a little more to our Kiva fund.
lender.occupational_info: We are journalists in training at a historically black college, N.C. Central U., in Durham, North Carolina.

lender.name: Rob O
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can make a real difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone whose life is more difficult than mine.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of pets: mostly dogs, and people at work.

lender.name: alexis
lender.occupation: college student/part time work at a gym

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I think this a great way to help our fellow earthlings, thanks for the opportunity.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I think that I was lucky to be born in the US and to have opportunities to help othes.
lender.occupational_info: I work marketing an engineering firm and writing proposals.

lender.name: Christi
lender.loan_because: i like thinking i am giving someone a hand up---sustainability
lender.occupational_info: i help provide low income housing with Habitat for Humanity

lender.name: Greg Huntoon
lender.loan_because: the amount of interest that our money earns in a regular savings account is insignificant when we look at how large of an affect that $25 or $50 can have on someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a designer.

lender.name: Jennyann
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do.

lender.name: danielle kelly
lender.loan_because: it's important to give back, especially to people in need. if i can help in any way i feel it is for a higher good for everyone .
lender.occupational_info: I'm a photographer/hairdresser / educator, and in NYC .

lender.name: Martin Byrne
lender.loan_because: I studied development economics and became interested in the problems of making development aid effective. I wanted to support those from tougher backgrounds than me, and I admire those who have entrepreneurial spirit and vision. I believe Kiva is an effective organisation and it allows me to directly support individuals.
lender.occupational_info: Business management in a design, manufacturing, wholesale and concessions business, in the fashion industry, specialising in jewellery.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: I have too much.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I believe that business can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an inspiration collector: I write for a national business magazine.

lender.name: Megann
lender.loan_because: Helping makes the world a better place.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: there are many people around the world that need a hand up not a hand out and I feel that we can make a difference by giving.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Provincial Government

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.name: Ashley
lender.occupation: graduate student at the university of texas

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because: Aruna and I are thankful for what we have and greatful that we can help others.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: It is nice to help someone who just needs a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse who transports people of all ages by helicopter.

lender.name: Brittney
lender.loan_because: money makes the world go 'round.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want people to have a better chance to succeed and make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I protect lawyers. Whether it is a good thing or bad thing depends on the firm. I work for a great one. So it is a good thing.

lender.name: JLK
lender.loan_because: I believe that people want to make a difference in their own lives and in the lives of others, and if the desire is there, I believe that the opportunities should be there as well.
lender.occupational_info: Represent buyers, sellers, and lenders in the sale, purchase and/or mortgaging of property.

lender.name: Sai
lender.loan_because: it's the least thing I can do to give back

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: microfinance is awesome.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently interning at GreenMango, a social enterprise in Hyderabad, India.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: It's a small contribution that can make a major impact on a person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I look for information to help my company do it's business.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed
lender.occupational_info: I manage Internet projects (business applications)

lender.name: Dale R
lender.loan_because: We all need a chance to build our lives with dignity and love.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired so my activities involve writing, art, gardening, social organizing, and studying and meditation.

lender.name: HelgaMarie
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to give back.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: I want my kids to know that even if people don't have a lot of money, they can still give a little to help balance things out around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I set people up for training classes so they can improve their skills while they are looking for work. I also do the graphic design work for our company

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to do some great things.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: I have become more aware in the past few years how blessed and fortunate my life has been. Kiva seems like a great way to have a positive impact. I bought my first three loans in honor of three great friends, Felicia, Ty and Natalie.
lender.occupational_info: I manipulate injured or sore muscles through massage. I also teach dance (ballet, modern, jazz) to beautiful and talented kids in San Diego. Once in awhile I also perform modern dance, a cross between ballet, jazz, ethnic dance forms and anything else you can imagine! (Picture is with my wonderful husband Frank, :)

lender.name: Katey
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate by myself and I am able to help others so why shouldn't I?
lender.occupational_info: I instruct children in different forms of dance including jazz, tap, and lyrical.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I have a responsibility to share what I have with others in need. Sharing globally is especially important to me.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles for magazines, internet websites and newspapers across the USA.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other. Mother Theresa

lender.name: Makela
lender.loan_because: I believe the most powerful way to improve living conditions in developing countries is through small businesses where people feel personally invested in the outcome. Work is meaningful and empowering.
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate the biological resources on properties to help property owners comply with state and federal environmental regulations.

lender.name: Baby Rachel
lender.loan_because: Anyone that is willing to work hard should always get a chance.

lender.name: Ghim
lender.loan_because: I like.
lender.occupational_info: I develop new products and services for the cellular communication industry.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Preston
lender.loan_because: I have seen firsthand the impact these loans can have on improving a familyâs livelihood and wellbeing.
lender.occupational_info: I am a development consultant working in Latin America on issues of trade and competitiveness, small business development, natural resource management, and poverty alleviation.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is a small thing that I can do to help someone else improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant for a large global business. My work consists of reporting and managing financial information for a division of that business.

lender.name: AmberT
lender.loan_because: Micro-Loans Rock! I hand up, not a handout.
lender.occupational_info: Translate for people who use different languages.

lender.name: Tess
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lender.name: Nicole, Austin and Devon
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Camaran
lender.loan_because: I believe we, as individuals, have the power to affect positive social change if we work together. To me, this is what microfinance does...it provides critical opportunities for individuals to empower themselves and change their lives for the better...

lender.name: John and Patricia
lender.loan_because: I feel gulty, or maybe blessed.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I can directly help people that are helping themselves.

lender.name: Brandie
lender.occupation: Co-Owner of various aviation related businesses
lender.loan_because: âTo laugh often and love much; to win the respect of intelligent persons and the affection of children, to earn the approbation of honest critics; to appreciate beauty; to give of one's self, to leave the world a bit better, whether by a healthy child, a garden patch or a redeemed social condition; to have played and laughed with enthusiasm and sung with exultation; to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived--that is to have succeeded.â --Ralph Waldo Emerson

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: i think it's a great idea

lender.name: Tedie and Katy West
lender.loan_because: God has given us mercy and grace and we should love our brothers as ourselves.

lender.name: Zac and Jaime
lender.loan_because: We would notbe where weare now without the generosity of others.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are dentists in San Carlos,California.

lender.name: JTS
lender.loan_because: Our family works directly with clients for two local charities. Kiva allows us to expand our personal support to individuals around the world.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves software systems. I work to improve the quality and reduce the costs of developing and maintaining those systems.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: it's personal, and it connects me with the greater world in a very real way.
lender.occupational_info: I write communications that help companies sell their products and services.

lender.name: Paula Miritello
lender.loan_because: I believe that when you help someone else it makes the world a much better place. It takes one act of kindness to change so much in the world. You afford someone else with the opportunity to achieve success!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being able to contribute, on a personal level, toward growing a small business. Kiva's tangible approach to micro-lending is very gratifying.

lender.name: Coupons 101
lender.loan_because: Life is good and it's time to share.

lender.name: Julian & Mercedes
lender.loan_because: Even the hardest working, most creative individuals will need some money to make their plans happen.
lender.occupational_info: My wife works as a Spanish Interpreter for a Hospital, and I fix and maintain telecommunication equipment for AT&T.

lender.name: Kimberlie
lender.loan_because: My husband and I are interested in helping individuals - not huge corporations.
lender.occupational_info: I am a producer at a post production facility in Los Angeles. Basically we edit commercials!

lender.name: vickie and al
lender.loan_because: we like the idea of individuals helping individuals. Using Kiva is a way to make the world smaller and, hopefully a better place for all of us to live.
lender.occupational_info: We are healers who work with energy to help those around us and those across the world.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I find it truly amazing that such a simple loan amount can dramatically impact the quality of life for others.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate healing through touch

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to reach those who need help improving their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: it's the least we can do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student of law.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: $25.00 is not a lot of money for some people in the United States. I am blessed to have the money to loan to someone who is striving to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes, land and commercial buildings.

lender.name: Eduardo
lender.loan_because: I found it interesting. lets see how it works. Besides I'm an entrepreneur myself, I would love to get support.

lender.name: Kenneth D
lender.loan_because: I like helping other people.

lender.name: Lisel
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to combat poverty and empower those with an entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I advocate on behalf of agricultural workers.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people less fortunate than me. I think Kiva is a wonderful website and without it alot of people would not be where they are today.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and learn about subjects such as social studies, science, math, and language arts.

lender.name: Tracey Lee
lender.occupational_info: Professor of English/Literature/Writing

lender.name: Christopher W.
lender.loan_because: I consider it part of my religious duty to help others. I have been the benefit of great generosity, and its time to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research on World Religions, American Religious History, and American Culture at the University level in the United States.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have a disproportionate share of the world's goods, since I live in America, and I want to share with others who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired high school teacher.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it's a start.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves quantifying the various pathways of water in the environment.

lender.occupational_info:
Graphic Artist.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people and really feel like you're making a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: This is a small step to help people who I otherwise would not meet.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in securing their future.

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to be financially stable and want to help others achieve greater financial stability.
lender.occupational_info: I help insurance companies determine how much much money to set aside to pay claims and how much to charge for insurance policies.

lender.name: Opey
lender.loan_because: because this kind of giving is powerful...more than just a hand out it is a hand up that supports families in their own work to raise themselves up from poverty, pay for their childrens educations and protect vulnerable communities from diseases like HIV and TB.
lender.occupational_info: I work with homeless families and children illiminate barriers to education and support them in getting housing, employement and education. I also do organizing work within the queer and transgender communities on my campus where I am studying to get a degree in Family and Human Services.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a real estate loan officer for 17 years, lending money to people who want to buy homes.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: There's a need.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: empowering others with my money is better then buying stuff.....
lender.occupational_info: My life is a continuous cycle of study and work....but its fun

lender.name: SANDY AND KEITH
lender.loan_because: our blessings are meant to be shared. We need to "Bless Forward" in any way we can everyday!

lender.name: FAITH LUTHERAN
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are involved in many humanitarian causes like World Vision 30-Hour Famine, we also sponsor 2 children through Christian Children fund. God has blessed us with these opportunities. All of us in youth group will take these experiences into our adulthood be a positive influence to our future children and the world. John Casciani youth leader , Faith Lutheran.
lender.occupational_info: The work we do as a youth group is God's work and we are proud to stand for things that really matter. CHECK OUT OUR KIVA VIDEO. http://vimeo.com/user887441

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do for those who want to do more.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: A fulfilling life requires investment in the aspirations of our fellow man.

lender.occupational_info: University student at Brown

lender.name: Tuxedo Cat
lender.loan_because: Life is good and it's time to share.

lender.name: Daley
lender.loan_because: I have too much, and too many people have too little.
lender.occupational_info: I paint with light

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: I want to help people pursue their dreams and live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a used bookstore where we buy people's used books, movies and music and sell them for half of what they would cost in a regular store. I love being around books all day and I love working for a company that recycles everything!

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: It is a way to bridge a gap across the world. The $25 somehow seem more valuable helping grow a new business than sitting in a bank account.
lender.occupational_info: I work with other engineers to design infrastructure that provides cities with clean drinking water and remove pollutants before they enter rivers and seas.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the right thing to do. In helping others. It makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I very much enjoy my work. I work out of my home, so I can spend more time with my wife and children

lender.name: Friend
lender.loan_because: Giving is my priority in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an administrator. I help people go to college

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It helps others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I have served in the United States Military for the past 25 years.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is important to share at least a small bit of what we have to make life better for people who are willing to work and have goals to make their lives better. I have been looking for a place where I fit for years. I think this is it.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer. I take pictures of people, places and things. I also work with a Greeting Card company.

lender.loan_because: It makes me HAPPY!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student so I study a lot. I also work in the medical records department at a local clinic which means that i look for a lot of charts.

lender.name: Don, Mary & Lily

lender.loan_because: We can, so we do.

lender.loan_because: I know that one person can make a difference and I want to be that kind of person.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children to see beauty in all things. I try to open their mind through art.

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and show my grandaughter how you can help people around the world

lender.name: Kaylene

lender.loan_because: I would like to buy 1 laptop for service my learning at university and my job in the future..I'm poor , so I want to have the helping of everybody. Pleise ...and thank you very much.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student , but I'll come out of my university and find for 1good job accordly ,I hope to make enough money to lend you sooner

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I truly believe it's the right thing to do. Why spend the money on another pair of shoes that will just get moldy before I even get a chance to wear them anywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I write about health issues as they affect people in Bermuda.

lender.name: Bain Real Estate
lender.loan_because: We at Bain Real Estate would like to reach out and help others become independent and successful.

lender.name: Desiree
lender.loan_because: I believe in life, if one works hard, he/she will achieve.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a good life and I want to share my good fortune with others. Kiva makes this easy.
lender.occupational_info: I work in offices all over the United States selling shares (parts) of companies as investments.

lender.name: Mari Jean
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of being the change I would like to see in the world
lender.occupational_info: My job is with an association / a small group of people who assist insurance agents in United States primarily Wiscocnsin - my office provides resources to help insurance agents do their jobs better. I like working with the agents because they often are the first ones at the scene of a loss whether it be a fire or a tornado ,flood car accident to name a few. They help people put their homes and lives back together after misfortune strikes.

lender.name: LOREN & DEBORAH, SISTERS
lender.loan_because: WE WANT TO EMPOWER OTHER WOMEN TO BELIEVE IN THEIR DREAMS!
lender.occupational_info:
Loren is a former banking professional and medical transcriptionist and now a stay-at-home mother.
Deborah is a second-year resident of anesthesiology and step-mother to six children.

lender.name: Elisa
lender.loan_because: My aunt and uncle gave me the first loan as a gift.

lender.name: Kate & Peter
lender.loan_because: We want to give others the opportunities for success that we have been afforded.
lender.occupational_info: Kate creates digital maps and Peter is a carpenter.

lender.name: Cathleen
lender.loan_because: I love being able to loan money directly to these beautiful, spirited, and creative individuals and being able to be part of their success.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: share the wealth- we have it way too good in this country.
lender.occupational_info: Work as an instructor to help people do their jobs safely.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand at times, and this is such a great opportunity to make an impact in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I have spent a lot of time travelling throughout the world, including countries such as Thailand, Cambodia and Vietnam - having the pleasure to meet so many great local people. lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: Working together makes a better world.

lender.name: Jon & Janice

lender.loan_because: I would like to make the workd a better place.

lender.loan_because: I care and I can. This life we get is not all about getting...........

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: It's great to help people!

lender.loan_because: I did microcredit lending in Mali when I was in Peace Corps.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I realize how incredibly fortunate we are to be born and raised in America. Everyday things that we take for granted here are reserved for the wealthy in other countries. I want my children to grow up with a sense of gratitude, not the sense of entitlement that I see all too often. Philanthropy, even in tiny amounts, will go a long way toward showing just how privileged we really are.
lender.occupational_info: I cook, clean, and chase after two young children all day.

lender.name: Tim & Doreen
lender.loan_because: We're blessed and want to share wih others who are not as fortunate as us.
lender.occupational_info: Tim - works with electrical lines to keep freeways lit and signal traffic lights working. Doreen - organize people and help support other workers.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: Because what is a tiny amount of money for me can make a huge impact for someone in another country.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.occupational_info: I invest in young businesses and help them grow.

lender.name: Greenland
lender.loan_because: we want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We are students at ATI from Maniitsoq, Greenland actively participating in the world.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I have traveled all over the world & have seen poverty at its worst. People need hope & opportunity. This is a small way I can help offer that.

lender.name: The Saad Family
lender.loan_because: It brings us tremendous joy to be minor contributors in someone's success, happiness, and quality of life improvement. But most importantly, it is the least we can do to alleviate poverty in this world.
lender.occupational_info: We are proud to offer our community with quality and reliable pre-owned vehicles.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: once upon a time, someone helped me out when I was in need.... It's time to give back!

lender.name: Dorcas
lender.loan_because: It honors God.
lender.occupational_info: i teach college.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe that each of us can give a little to help many people.
lender.occupational_info: a caring Christian devoted to making a difference

lender.name: Dena
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to earn a decent wage. I believe if you give someone the opportunity to succeed, they will! Every adventure has risks but to help someone build on their dreams, the reward is much greater than money.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of physically impaired individuals so they may remain in their own homes.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I like to teach people to fish.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I like to help people and this is a way to help someone change their life.

lender.name: Kalob
lender.loan_because: Me and my family do it to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in 6th grade. my mom works at a hospital,my dad works for the railroad.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: Over the years, many people have helped me. Because of their help, I am now able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor in the area of the United States that was affected by hurricanes Katrina and Rita in 2005 and Gustav and Ike in 2008. I directed my denomination's storm recovery process in this area for 2 1/2 years and now I am pastoring a church in southwest Louisiana.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to make life better for others
lender.occupational_info: I'm a stay at home mom raising 3 children.

lender.name: Beth- Phoenix AZ
lender.loan_because: There is no greater feeling than that of helping others. I believe deeply in karma... as we give, we receive.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: This is a great, affordable way to help others. We can make a difference with a small amount.
lender.occupational_info: Designer and seamstress for clothing and accessories.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I like to help others who want to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school in the city of Memphis.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I care about people and if there is people in the world who i can help without losing too much then why not. I get a good feeling from it and its good to see someone succeding.
lender.occupational_info: This work is excellent it makes you feel really good about yourself to know youve helped someone else

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: I like, generally speaking, people.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of simple tasks, but constantly.

lender.name: Brad & Ronelle
lender.loan_because: We want to help improve the lives of other people.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.occupational_info: I am a college writing teacher. I teach essay writing and poetry writing.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe people who are hard working should have every chance to succeed in creating the life they are hoping for.

lender.name: timothy
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have had so much in my life. I remember how it felt to have someone help me when I needed it the most. I want to return that favor. To do something for someone in need, and expect nothing in return is the greatest thing I think we can do for others.

lender.name: Garth
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate in the Western World to have so many riches and not just monetary. It has a feel good factor to be able to help other people along the way.
lender.occupational_info: I produce a regular FREE Recipe Newsletter which is sent by email to several hundred subscribers around the world. I also enjoy comments and articles from readers. To subscribe for FREE send an email to GarthsRecipeNewsletter@gmail.com

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: What do I have that I did not receive?
lender.occupational_info: I work in a clinic with 5 other doctors, seeing patients everyday for illnesses and health maintenance. I am both an internist and pediatrician. I am married and have 2 sons and a daughter-in-law.

lender.name: Susi
lender.loan_because: our global economy is important.
lender.occupational_info: I sell houses to those who need to sell or buy a home.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students about business and management.

lender.name: SHARON
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP SOMEONE ELSE IN THEIR LIFE BECAUSE AT ONE TIME WE WERE POOR AND I KNOW WHAT IT IS LIKE TO WONDER WHERE THE NEXT DOLLAR WILL COME FROM TO BUY FOOD.
lender.occupational_info: MY HUSBAND AND I HAVE A CABINET MAKING BUSINESS IN WESTERN CANADA. I ALSO WORK FULL TIME IN A MEDICAL CLINIC TO HELP SUPPLEMENT OUR INCOME.

lender.name: Jo
lender.loan_because: so many people have helped me as I work, study or travel around the world and this is a perfect way to give back.

lender.name: Greg Mowrey
lender.loan_because: It is fun.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I would hope someone would do the same for me
lender.occupational_info: I support programs at my company to enhance and protect their life outside of work and encourage them to take care of their families, live healthfully and happily and give back to the world.

lender.name: Rachel & Anthony
lender.loan_because: Thanks to Kiva, we have an easy and a great way to reach a specific person ready to put the money to work.

lender.name: BOBBI
lender.loan_because: I think this is such a WONDERFUL idea!!

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I have been selling software for the last 27 years. But now I am on my own with 2 new businesses. It's a lot of fun.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I get a feeling of accomplishment knowing that my loans however small are helping someone improve the lives of their familes. I also feel connected to the world in my effort to improve home businesses in emerging rural areas. It is heart warming to know that the efforts of many are helping someone & somewhere who would not otherwise have had a chance for a loan to improve their home business.
lender.occupational_info: My career is all about planning a project that has a specific intent and timeline. In planning these project my job is to keep everyone focused on their tasks and time commitments.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people.

lender.name: Lisa and Gary
lender.loan_because: We have a very blessed life and we want to bless others... we feel fortunate to have an opportunity to provide an opportunity...

lender.name: Bjorn
lender.occupation: Grandson: half Birthday gift from Grandma Barker
lender.loan_because: I give because I want Lagi Felise's children to have opportunities that my grandson Bjorn has. My gift is in honor of Bjorn's half birthday.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a library.

lender.name: sergio
lender.loan_because: of Karma
lender.occupational_info: Boring

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed that I can choose the future for money that flows to me. By loaning to others, I get to make that money make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my household, daughter and husband. I work as a volunteer at my daughter's school and my church. Previously I worked as a music teacher.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: We collect seed and grow local native plants for revegetation, also rehabilate injured and orphan wildlife.

lender.name: Abay
lender.loan_because: I loan because there is nothing better then giving hope and I enjoy the good fight. By giving loans people will learn how to do not take. I donât believe in free money â and loaning gives me that option.
lender.occupational_info: I come up with ideas and planes on how to inform or sell products to people.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to help a lot.
lender.occupational_info: In my retirement I love helping people, and now, with Kiva I have found another way to do just that.

lender.name: Girl Power loan club
lender.loan_because: We are a group of women ranging in age from our thirties up to 70. We loan to support women all over the world.

lender.name: Meguido Zola
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of the vision.
lender.occupational_info: I help people become the promise of who they are.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: A way to redistribute the obscene amount of wealth in the "West" to parts of the globe living on mere dollars a day while preserving the borrowers' dignity. No one likes the baggage handouts come burdened with.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently writing a thesis on the chemical weapons attacks against the Kurds in 1988 and also volunteer for Amnesty International and a local organization that works for peace and justice for the Palestinians called the Middle East Peace and Justice Alliance (MEPJA).

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: "Kindness is timeless."
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical interpreter. I accompany patients who do not speak English to their medical appointments. I help the patient and the practitioner communicate.

lender.name: THE NICKLOS FAMILY
lender.loan_because: i'm able to

lender.loan_because: i know how my money helps others

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: People are inherently good, and when given a chance they will exceed your expectations more times than not.
lender.occupational_info: Helping the world communicate.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Capitalism benefits the whole society.

lender.name: Karen

lender.name: Adrienne

lender.occupational_info: I try to give someone an opportunity or an experience they wouldn't have gotten if I wasn't in their life.

lender.name: Dayna
lender.loan_because: I want to lead by example - to show my students simple ways that they can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school Spanish teacher. Though my actual job is to teach a foreign language, I try to teach my students to be responsible young adults and good global citizens as well.

lender.loan_because: I LOAN BECAUSE IT WS BECAUSE OF LACK OF FINANCIAL BACKING THAT MADE ME TO LOSE THE OPPORTUNITY TO HAVE MADE A SUCCESSFUL BUSINESS START

lender.name: Jerald
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate in my life and want to see others do well. I have spent a number of years in West Africa and have witnessed the effect of what many would consider to be meaningless pocket change can have on someone in need.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to provide for those they love!
lender.occupational_info: I do accounting work in a County Tax Collectors Office. I have worked there for over 23 years. I also am involved in a local charity to prevent child abuse, which I was working at when I had the picture taken.

lender.name: Mayumi
lender.loan_because: we are one family on the Earth.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I admire the work ethic and ambition these people have and want to help them succeed in their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I raise and sell alpacas. I also spin their wool and knit it .

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to make their dreams a reality. Sometimes a little bit of faith in God and goodness to mankind is all it takes to make a bit of meaningful change. I want to be an example for others. I loan in memory of my father who died of cancer.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the sales and brand development with wholesale retail partners for a womens clothing company.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: We rent movies through the internet.

lender.name: Jacqui
lender.loan_because: I want to show my son that the world extends beyond our front door and we can all do something to help.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that I can contribute to this brilliant concept and do my small part to improve others' circumstances.

lender.name: Jaime and Michelle

lender.name: Navin Kumar
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I want other women to have the opportunity to work for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant by education and experience who worked in the world of income tax for many years. I am recently unemployed, but also enjoy crafts and patio gardening.

lender.name: KB
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Darcy&Michael
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate to live in the United States. Our freedom is great, and we have a good income from our work. We feel the world would be a better place if everyone shared their good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: Darcy makes artworks from fabric and Michael is a mathematician.

lender.name: Peter Lennon
lender.loan_because: Everyone has a duty to help those less well off if they wish to think of themselves as civilised. I am secure financially and emotionally so it is only right that I do my bit; if everyone does a little the end result is a lot.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher and head of deaprtment in a secondary school in the north east of England.

lender.name: Robin Palmer
lender.loan_because: I believe in KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: My Successables, Inc. creates products that help people to successfully achieve their goals and dreams. "My Wake Up Call" is a unique motivational alarm clock that helps listeners to awaken positively focused. "My Visual Valet" and "My Remember- Ring" use visual eye-Qs for your daily essential belongings, so you always know where they are when you're home, and you always remember to bring them with you, when you're not!

lender.name: Evi
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance at success and independence for themselves, their families and communities

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I want to share the opportunity that I have been given through loans in order to increase the quality of life for others.
lender.occupational_info: I care for and train horses and also manage the business aspects of a commercial equestrian facility.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and want to share what I have so that others can achieve their dreams

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: Providing microloans seems to me a respectful way to collaborate with business owners around the world who may not have as many resources available to them as I do here in the United States. Directly supporting a particular business humanizes the interaction for me. I feel I've gained an entrepreneurial friend I'm now rooting for, and I feel more like a global citizen.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teams of writers, artists, computer programmers and others to help businesses train their people and help organizations of all kinds communicate on the Internet.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying for a degree in Sociology with a minor in Business Administration at DePaul University.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I have to do something to help the people of the world, and this is something small I can do. Kiva works with real people, with real problems, that are just trying to survive and provide for their loved ones. I feel a tremendous respect for Kiva, and those that seek it's help, and am proud to be a small part of that effort.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for smart-phones.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: it is an amazing opportunity to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: the need for help is so big.Gift a chance.
lender.occupational_info: To hope always never loose courage

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I believe that by helping one another the world becomes a better place
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed business woman who helps others start/maintain a helathy lifestyle through physical activity and proper nutrition

lender.name: STAND Coalition at LNHS
lender.loan_because: WE are global citizens. The purpose of living is to see each other through.
lender.occupational_info: The STAND group is comprised of dedicated and energetic students concerned with raising awareness, fundraising, and advocacy for humanitarian issues in Africa, and the world.

lender.name: Galatea
lender.loan_because: I am very grateful to not live in poverty and I want to help people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I represent people who have been accused of crimes and make sure that the government does not wrongfully send them to jail.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I have faith in people who are working hard to make a better life for themselves and their family
lender.occupational_info: I used to teach 11 year old children who had severe bahavior difficulties in their local school. They came by bus to our special school 5 days a week. There were only 6 or 7 students in each class.

lender.name: Paula & Mike
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.' Matt 25:40

lender.name: Lance In California
lender.loan_because: Many people just need a chance. Organizations like this bridge the gap so individuals can help others achieve their dreams and goals. We can all make the world a better place :-)
lender.occupational_info: I observe how companies operate and then recommend, install and maintain computer hardware, software, networks and internet solutions to make them more productive.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me. Many people have given of themselves to me to make my life better. It's about giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I like to help. To earn a living I work with low voltage systems, primarily security, camera, fire, control and communications systems.

lender.name: Ron Michael Zettlemoyer
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build computer systems and software.

lender.name: Michael & Bill
lender.loan_because: It is important to lend a helping hand to others so that all can benefit, giving makes you happy when you can make a positive impact in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a resource on people management for the company

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I have work hard and there was that person to help me along the way.This is my way of being that person to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Long hours , hectic, rewarding and satisfying.Knowing that you have made someone happy.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: > I'm grateful for my blessings > I remember what it was like to do without > Inspired by people who helped me when I was down > Because I can ;-}~
lender.occupational_info: Helping people who've had accidents to navigate the healthcare & insurance quagmire.
